extName.message: ReplyBot.ai - Whatsapp 自動化 AI 機器人

extDescription.message: ReplyBot 會自動回覆 WhatsApp Web 上的客戶。由人工智慧驅動的個人化響應。自動翻譯訊息。聊天總結器

extTitle.message: 打開 Whatsapp 選項卡和回復機器人側面板 (Alt+R)

openPopup.message: 開啟未讀訊息彈出視窗

switchTab.message: 切換到最後一個選項卡

summarizer_downloading_in_progress.message: 摘要器下載正在進行中

replace_src_text_with_translated.message: 將 src 文字替換為翻譯後的文本

how_url_patterns_work.message: URL 模式在 ReplyBot AI 中的工作原理
how_url_patterns_work.description: How URL Patterns Work in ReplyBot AI

replybot_will_extract_the_ASIN.message: ReplyBot 將從代理程式的輸入中提取 ASIN
replybot_will_extract_the_ASIN.description: ReplyBot will extract the ASIN from the agent's input

if_the_customer_has_provided_the_ASIN.message: ReplyBot 將檢查客戶是否提供了 ASIN，如果沒有，請詢問客戶是否提供。
if_the_customer_has_provided_the_ASIN.description: ReplyBot will check if the customer has provided the ASIN, or ask the customer for it if not available.

suggest_upto_5_reply_messages.message: 建議最多 5 則回覆訊息

switch_tab_when_new_message_received.message: 收到新訊息時切換選項卡
switch_tab_when_new_message_received.description: Switch Tab When new message received

switch_tab_time_schedule.message: 切換選項卡 時間表

open_popup_when_new_message_received.message: 收到新訊息時打開彈出視窗
open_popup_when_new_message_received.description: Open popup When new message received

no_open_chat.message: 目前 WhatsApp 中沒有開啟任何聊天。請開啟聊天視窗
no_open_chat.description: No chats are currently open in WhatsApp. Please open a chat
